name: Stichting Duurzame Palingsector Nederland
goal:
DUPAN is the Dutch Association of Eel traders (NeVePaling), the Dutch Association of fish farmers (NEVEVI) and the organisation of professional fishermen (netVISwerk). The foundations purpose is to achieve the recovery of the European eel. It undertakes activities that contribute to a sustainable recovery of the eel stocks in the Dutch and European inland waterways. In addition, DUPAN is working on sustainable solutions for the catch and farming of eel, for environmental and animal-friendly processing, and is stimulating scientific research for eels. By doing so the DUPAN Foundation strives towards a sustainable conservation of Dutch eel and the eel sector.

The Sustainable Eel Fund
The DUPAN foundation is founder and trust holder of the Sustainable Eel Fund. This Fund contributes to the DUPAN activities. The members of DUPAN generate the money in the Fund through a commission on eel sales. Besides that food producers, grants and gifts raise the fund. Thanks to the Eel Stewardship Fund, DUPAN is able to achieve her goals and finance a vast number of activities.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Customs, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Trade
euInitiatives:
EU Council regulation 11/2007
Common Fisheries Policies
Water Framework Directive
The Habitats Directive
